Container.Name: UpdateTool
Container.Overview: Update Tool allows you to update/refresh the IMDB ratings of movies/TV shows within your plex libraries!
Container.Description: Update Tool allows you to update/refresh the IMDB ratings of movies/TV shows within your plex libraries!

Config.Name: Plex Data Directory
Config.Description: The 'Plex Media Server' dir that contains directories like 'Plugin Support'.

Config.Name: Invoke every n hour(s)
Config.Description: Invoke the tool every n hour(s) to scan the libraries

Config.Name: TMDB API Key
Config.Description: TMDB API Key - Resolves libraries with TMDB agent matched movies

Config.Name: TVDB API Key
Config.Description: TVDB API Key - Resolves TV Show libraries with TVDB agent matched shows

Config.Name: Library Ignore List
Config.Description: You can ignore libraries here by supplying their IDs like this: Single Library => '1' | Multiple Libraries => '1;2;3'. Ignored libraries will not be scanned or updated. More in the original github readme.

Config.Name: Capabilities Configuration
Config.Description: Allows you to specify UpdateTool behavior. Supply capabilities like this: Single => 'NO_TV' | Multiple => 'NO_TV;NO_MOVIE'. More in the original github readme.

Config.Name: JVM Maximum Heap Size
Config.Description: Allows to specify the maximum heap size that the executing JVM can allocate. Only change this if you run into out of memory issues with very large (40000+ items) libraries. Example: 256m, 512m, 1g, 2g
